attributes.action: Support the setting up of a no fly zone over Ukraine
attributes.additional_details:
3 reasons

To hinder and stop the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

To prevent a humanitarian disaster.

To defend Ukraines right to democracy and self determination.
attributes.background: Ask NATO partners to set up a no fly zone over Ukraine immediately and on an open ended basis

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609437
